attributes.action: On the anniversary of Grenfell the London Eye should light up in green
attributes.background: 14th of June 2019 would be a year on since the fire of Grenfell Tower. 72 people had died in the fire and it is only right that the London Eye on the day is lit Green in honour of those who had lost their lives or were affected by the events. To show solidarity and awareness for the community.

rejection.details:
The London Eye isn't run by the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could contact the London Eye directly to make this suggestion:

https://support.londoneye.com/hc/en-us
